definition: and/as well as/and so/but (not)/yet (not)/(indicates causal relation)/(indicates change of state)/(indicates contrast)
to speak/to talk/to converse/to chat/to discuss

sentences.english: Since I do not know the details, I can only generalize about the matter.
sentences.chinese: 由於不瞭解詳情，我對此事只能泛泛而談。

sentences.english: I'm just talking the abstract now.
sentences.chinese: 我現在只是在泛泛而談。

sentences.english: He urged Obama not to speak in generalities.
sentences.chinese: 他敦促奧巴馬不要泛泛而談。
該發言人只是泛泛而談。
